description:
Searching for a wife for a wealthy eleven year old turns out to be no small task for the Otogi Bank. The Academy’s entire female student body is left scathed by insults from the boy’s choosy butler.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Okami-san and the Mouse Bride Search, and This Is How Pigs Should Be Treated
Ookami-san to Nezumi no Yomesagashi to Yappari Buta wa Kou Iu Atsukai
おおかみさんとねずみの嫁探しとやっぱり豚はこういう扱い
